name: Nothing else Matters
desc:
So close, no matter how <input type="text" value="" data-result="far" />
Couldn't be much more from the <input type="text" value="" data-result="heart" />
Forever <input type="text" value="" data-result="trusting" /> who we are
and nothing else matters

Never opened <input type="text" value="" data-result="myself" /> this way
Life is ours, we live it our <input type="text" value="" data-result="way" />
All these words I don't just <input type="text" value="" data-result="say" />
and nothing else matters 

Trust I seek and I <input type="text" value="" data-result="find" /> in you
Every day for us something new
Open mind for a <input type="text" value="" data-result="different" /> view
and nothing else matters

never cared for what they <input type="text" value="" data-result="do" />
never cared for what they <input type="text" value="" data-result="know" />
but I <input type="text" value="" data-result="know" />

[...]

never cared for what they <input type="text" value="" data-result="say" />
never cared for games they <input type="text" value="" data-result="play" />
never cared for what they <input type="text" value="" data-result="do" />
never cared for what they <input type="text" value="" data-result="know" />
and I <input type="text" value="" data-result="know" />
